credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: figure study: design for a fountain
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
medium: black crayon, white chalk, on gray paper
description: Vertical rectangle. The nude figure of a boy, standing, seen from the back. The arms are uplifted, the hands indicated briefly. Basin on boy's head, and pedestal, suggested.
name: Drawing
